project.description: s3 bucket creation - s3 for storing the k8s configuration Enable versioning and encrypt the configuration

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: S3NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The S3 bucket store your k8s configuration will be created.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: aws s3api create-bucket --bucket $S3NAME --region us-east-1 aws s3api put-bucket-versioning --bucket $S3NAME --versioning-configuration Status=Enabled aws s3api put-bucket-encryption --bucket $S3NAME --server-side-encryption-configuration '{"Rules":[{"ApplyServerSideEncryptionByDefault":{"SSEAlgorithm":"AES256"}}]}'
